articles.description:
RT Colin Forward
D_D members have exclusive access to a $15k travel fund for the @activate_build Miami Hackathon. Thanks to @C3protocol, members can apply for $$ assistance and build solutions on Algorand. There’s a prize pool of $50,000 + bounties. Apply here! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfON26e8LOUeTI4lElgQnv52QtmuIxFJcY7z2WNXuiM451tDw/viewform

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Kui He
Don't forget today's koinos Talk. I host the show with fellow @developer_dao member @lukemwillis. Luke is a seasoned developer and a recent crypto convert while I've been using fee less blockchains and aping since 2017. You'll get both sides of the picture on why koinos.
The Koinos Forum: Tomorrow, we're going to explain why we're all in on Koinos, in detail. We'll list why the bet is favorable and where there are going to be challenges along the ride.
 https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1OwxWzEEypAJQ

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Sam Williams 🐘
Truth.
Consider @ArweaveTeam a protocol in need of DevRel 🙂.
nader dabit (🧱, 🚀) | sha.eth | nader.sol: How to get hired in DevRel in web3
1. Find a protocol / team in need of DevRel
2. Learn tech then create a good example codebase with high quality learning material around it - workshop, tutorial, video
3. Apply for a grant, get paid for your work regardless
4. Share it
5. Apply
articles.title: RT Sam Williams 🐘: Truth. Consider @ArweaveTeam a protocol in need of DevRel 🙂.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT with-heart
Hi! I'm the leader of the dev guild @developer_dao!
For the entirety of my time in that role, I've felt that DAO leadership requires "X in public", where X is literally everything
I've been too terrified of that to act on it. But not anymore
So, some thoughts on leadership
